data.author: Dr. David Brown

changelog.release_notes: Initial release. Text-based watchface that displays date, time, astrological sign, lunar phase and the planet associated with the day of the week. Also displays battery level and bluetooth status indicators. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

data.description:
Astrological is a text-based watchface showing:
* Date
* Time
* Sun Sign
* Lunar Phase (as text)
* Planet associated with Day of Week
* Equinoxes and Solstices
* Battery Level Indicator
* Bluetooth Connection Status

Lunar Phase is shown as one of 8 phases:
* New Moon
* Waxing Crescent
* First Quarter
* Waxing Gibbous
* Full Moon
* Waning Gibbous
* Third Quarter
* Waning Crescent

The traditional planets associated with the days of the week are:
* Sunday - Sun
* Monday - Moon
* Tuesday - Mars
* Wednesday - Mercury
* Thursday - Jupiter
* Friday - Venus
* Saturday - Saturn

The day of week display is replaced on equinoxes and solstices as follows:
* March 20-22 - Vernal Equinox
* June 20-22 - Summer Solstice
* September 20-22 - Autumnal Equinox
* December 20-22- Winter Solstice

The watchface also vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release. Text-based watchface that displays date, time, astrological sign, lunar phase and the planet associated with the day of the week. Also displays battery level and bluetooth status indicators. Vibrates on bluetooth disconnect.
